lead_paragraph: Japan's Prime Minister Shinzo Abe headed to Russia on Friday in a show of support for President Vladimir Putin at the Sochi Olympics, just hours after headlining a rally demanding that Moscow return islands seized from Japan.

headline.main: Japan's Abe Backs Putin With Visit, in Contrast to China, Korea Ties
headline.print_headline: Japan's Abe Backs Putin With Visit, in Contrast to China, Korea Ties
